useCase.name: Interviewee Recruitment Process
useCase.description: Manage the recruitment of interview participants from the Research Participant Database

preconditions.precondition: Researcher has identified criteria for selecting participants

successEndConditions.condition: The final list of interview participants has been confirmed

useCase.trigger: Researcher needs to finalize the list of interview participants

mainSequence.step: Recruitment Tool queries potential participants in the database.
Database returns a list of potential interviewees to the Recruitment Tool
Researcher reviews the list of potential participants
Recruitment Tool sends invitations for interviews to selected participants
Participants respond to the interview invitations
Recruitment Tool reports responses to the Researcher
Researcher schedules interviews with accepted participants
Recruitment Tool confirms interview schedules with participants
Participants confirm attendance for the interviews
